remarks: A condition for a structure not to be a monoid: every element of the base set is not a left identity for at least one element of the base set.  (Contributed by AV, 4-Feb-2020.)
statement:
isnmnd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` M ) $.
isnmnd.o $e |- .o. = ( +g ` M ) $.
isnmnd $p |- ( A. z e. B E. x e. B ( z .o. x ) =/= x -> M e/ Mnd ) $.
$d .o. x z $.
$d B x z $.
$d M x z $.
